title: The bizarre celebrity holiday photo
text:
Play video Mariah Carey and her billionaire beau James Packer were looking very loved up as they stepped off their super yacht for lunch in Formentera. After disembarking the Artic P vessel, owned by the Australian Businessman, the pair were whisked to shore on a speedboat, before being helped onto the beach by helpful deck hands. Mariah, dressed in a revealing swimsuit and sarong combo, stopped to pose for photos with beach going fans before heading into a seaside restaurant. Clearly impressed by the way his glamorous lady looked James gave Mariah a cheeky pat on the bum as they waited for their table. Rightster 03 Jul 2015 Entertainment On holiday ... Australian billionaire James Packer with Mariah Carey in Capri, Italy Picture: Supplied Source: Supplied AUSTRALIAN celebrities have been jetsetting all over the globe to escape our winter and find sunny skies and adventure on their getaways. Here's what 11 of them have been up to. 1. JAMES PACKER AND MARIAH CAREY Australia’s billionaire has been joined at the hip with the American pop superstar ever since their relationship became public while they were holidaying in Italy. While the world has watched, it has been a family holiday and romantic getaway for lovebirds, as Carey brought her children Monroe and Morocco on to Packer’s luxury yacht. Packer, 47, and Carey, 45 — dubbed PaRiah — became public when the couple were spotted on a romantic stroll together through the streets of Capri. Australian billionaire James Packer pictured with Mariah Carey in Capri, Italy Picture: Supplied Source: Supplied 2. JACKIE O AND LEE HENDERSON KIIS FM radio co-host Jackie O is in Fiji with her husband Lee and their daughter Kitty. Followers have described her posts as being just like “postcards”. Jackie O on holidays
(Frame content direct link: https://instagram.com/p/4qKk48L76_/embed.)
Jackie O island hopping
(Frame content direct link: https://instagram.com/p/4vV83WL7zy/embed.)
3. KYLE SANDILANDS Meanwhile, Kyle Sandilands is in Paris with his girlfriend Imogen Anthony, where they have been sightseeing and taking in the Eiffel Tower. Kyle and Imogen
(Frame content direct link: https://instagram.com/p/4pjSB9Pa_r/embed.)
4. THE BONDI VET Dr Chris Brown — aka The Bondi Vet is in Ecuador where he photographed a stray dog that was following him. On his post, he wrote: “The only way to photograph him was to use his silhouette against a shop wall. Look closely and you can see me ... in a poncho ... lying on the road taking his picture. And ... you can see him looking completely confused. Needless to say after providing such good company, he didn’t go hungry”. Dr Chris Brown's strange photo
(Frame content direct link: https://instagram.com/p/4x8ncUxQ3a/embed.)
5. TIM ROBARDS AND ANNA HEINRICH Former Bachelor Tim Robards and his partner Anna Heinrich are in Bali, where they created a human love heart together against the backdrop of a gorgeous sunset. Anna and Tim
(Frame content direct link: https://instagram.com/p/4tlmk0yfU5/embed.)
Anna by the pool
(Frame content direct link: https://instagram.com/p/4xui25yfau/embed.)
6. SHANE WARNE The King of Spin Shane Warne has been in Las Vegas with his family, where he reports that daily temperatures have been around 46 degrees! Warnie in Vegas
(Frame content direct link: https://instagram.com/p/4x3bQduATy/embed.)
Warnie and son Jackson chill out
(Frame content direct link: https://instagram.com/p/4p1U29OARa/embed.)
7. NOVA’S FITZY NovaFM’s Fitzy is kicking back at Australasia’s most awarded luxury nature-resort located on the Great Barrier Reef, the One&Only Hayman Island, with his wife and their son Ted. Fitzy at Hayman Island
(Frame content direct link: https://instagram.com/p/4xyh95Rl7N/embed.)
8. ROBYN LAWLEY She may be working, but Australian plus-size supermodel Robyn Lawley is away on location at Jackson Hole, Wyoming in the US, where she has been doing a swimsuit shoot for Sports Illustrated. Robyn Lawley on location
(Frame content direct link: https://instagram.com/p/4xk_LqCJNd/embed.)
9. KYLIE AND NATALIE Australian pop princess Kylie Minogue is on a girlie getaway with singer Natalie Imbruglia on a luxury boat. Kylie and Natalie
(Frame content direct link: https://instagram.com/p/4w3Y1Kgfwd/embed.)
10. JODHI MEARES Aside from meeting up with James Packer and his new girlfriend Mariah Carey, Jodhi Meares has been travelling around Italy where she has been at a yoga retreat. Jodhi meets up with James and Mariah
(Frame content direct link: https://instagram.com/p/4NPprdt_0n/embed.)
Jodhi on a break
(Frame content direct link: https://instagram.com/p/4Z5HLkN_4u/embed.)
11. SHARNI VINSON Aussie actress Sharni Vinson is on safari in South Africa, where she’s been sharing photos of lions, zebras, elephants and quad biking alongside having a small pit stop for wine. Sharni spots an elephant
(Frame content direct link: https://instagram.com/p/4r0qZcmFhL/embed.)
Sharni's safari
